description: Defines a remote SAML to use as an authentication source.

ID.description: ID is the identifier of the object.
ID.title: ID

IDPCertificate.description: Identity Provider Certificate in PEM format.
IDPCertificate.title: IDPCertificate

IDPIssuer.description: Identity Provider Issuer (also called Entity ID).
IDPIssuer.title: IDPIssuer

IDPMetadata.description: Pass some XML data containing the IDP metadata that can be used for automatic configuration. If you pass this attribute, every other one will be overwritten with the data contained in the metadata file, but it does not take precendence over IDPMetadataURL.
IDPMetadata.title: IDPMetadata

IDPMetadataURL.description: The URL where to fetch the IDPMetadata. If this is set, all other IDP fields are ignored and the metadata will be retrieved when needed for logging in.
IDPMetadataURL.title: IDPMetadataURL

audienceURI.description: The AudienceURI expected for the response. If not provided, Acuvity will send the issuer URL.
audienceURI.title: audienceURI

ignoredKeys.description: A list of claims that will be filtered out from the identity token. A claim will be ignored if it is prefixed with one of the items in the ignoredKeys list. This runs before includedKeys computation.
ignoredKeys.title: ignoredKeys

importHash.description: The hash of the structure used to compare with new import version.
importHash.title: importHash

importLabel.description: The user-defined import label that allows the system to group resources from the same import operation.
importLabel.title: importLabel

includedKeys.description: A list of claims that defines which claims will be added to the identity token. A claim will be included if it is prefixed with one of the items in the includedKeys list. This runs after ignoreddKeys computation.
includedKeys.title: includedKeys

modifier.description: Contains optional information about a remote service that can be used to modify the claims that are about to be delivered using this authentication source.
modifier.title: modifier

serviceProviderIssuer.description: The Service Provider Issuer which is represented by the client ID. If not provided, Acuvity will send the issuer URL.
serviceProviderIssuer.title: serviceProviderIssuer

skipResponseSignatureCheck.description: If true, the issue request won't check the ResponseSignatureValidated.
skipResponseSignatureCheck.title: skipResponseSignatureCheck

subjects.description: List of claims that will provide the subject.
subjects.title: subjects

updateTime.description: Last update date of the object.
updateTime.title: updateTime

title: SAMLSource
